name: pimp
description: Pimp is a small & simple (P)romise/A+ (imp)lementation that I wrote to wrap my head around the spec.

scripts.test: ( set PIMP_LIB_DIR=../lib/wrap || export PIMP_LIB_DIR=../lib/wrap ) && promises-aplus-tests tests/compliance_adapter && mocha tests/pimpTests.js
scripts.build: ( set PIMP_LIB_DIR=../lib/wrap || export PIMP_LIB_DIR=../lib/wrap ) && promises-aplus-tests tests/compliance_adapter && mocha tests/pimpTests.js && node generateBrowserVersion
scripts.cov: rm -f instrumented/* && jscoverage lib instrumented && ( set PIMP_LIB_DIR=../instrumented/wrap || export PIMP_LIB_DIR=../instrumented/wrap ) && mocha -R html-cov tests/pimpTests.js > coverage.html

author: Mudit Ameta
